intentRules.description: Customer wants to check order status
examples: What's the status of my order #ORD001ABC?

intentRules.description: Customer wants to search for products
Customer wants to check product availability
examples: Do you have MacBook in stock?
How do I get a refund?
What payment methods do you accept?

responseTemplates.ORDER_STATUS: I found your order {orderNumber}. Current status: {status}. {additionalInfo}
responseTemplates.PRODUCT_FOUND: I found {count} products matching your search: {products}
responseTemplates.PRODUCT_NOT_FOUND: I couldn't find any products matching '{query}'. Would you like me to suggest alternatives?
responseTemplates.AVAILABILITY_IN_STOCK: Yes, {productName} is currently in stock. We have {quantity} units available.
responseTemplates.AVAILABILITY_OUT_OF_STOCK: Sorry, {productName} is currently out of stock. Would you like to be notified when it's available?
responseTemplates.MISSING_INFO: I need more information. Could you provide {missingEntity}?
